description: Young bodybuilders like Philippe are pretty easy to find in Montreal. But very few of them are willing to let another man worship them in front of the camera and even less to jerk'em off. Before shooting this scene I wanted to make sure Philippe was really ok with it and understood that it was going to be on the net. Lucky us, he had no problem with it. Though you can sense from time to time that he was uncomfortable, he really enjoyed the experience. I sure liked it! Stroking this young jock's large uncut cock was a joy though it was really hard for me to keep my mouth away from it... Maybe next time.
title: Need A Hand Philippe?, Scene #01
